channel.title: Juan Andrés Nin
channel.description: Recent content on Juan Andrés Nin

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Juan Andrés Nin a programmer and game designer from Uruguay with more than 10 years of professional experience. In 2021 I cofounded Tragico Media where we are currently working on our first game: a surrealist comedy point and click adventure. Previously I worked at Ironhide Game Studio. I have worked on the following games: Junkworld Worked as lead programmer on multiple prototypes during preproduction and led a team of three programmers from this stage onto softlaunch.

item.title: First post
item.description: This is a first post on a blog which hopefully sees new content in the future.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can find me on twitter or contact me by email.
